welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kuna, where small town charm meets outdoor adventure. Get ready to experience our picturesque landscapes, friendly community, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and fall in love with all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary concourse for Alaska Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the primary concourse for Delta Air Lines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
